author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Wake Up Call! Government's Unbelievable Immorality Illustrated for All To See! | Alternative
text:
(Before It's News)
If it is immoral for me to force you to give me your money and harm you if you don’t, what makes it okay for people who opperate under the “authority” of “Government” to do the same thing?
Thanks for taking your time to check out this information. Love to hear what YOU think in the comments section below! If you find that you liked this story, don’t forget to hit the “RECOMMEND CONTRIBUTOR” and “RECOMMEND STORY” button at the top of the page so that I can bring you more articles like this.
